column5: These were the two most acrobatic fish i have ever encountered.  Both were caught mid-day on a watermelon pattern tube.  (while fishing for bass)
Thas awesome ... now you've done it ... everyone will be hitting the tribs
LOL no doubt, with tubes and ultralight gear too i bet.
Sweet!!! got to love it when you can hook into steel while bassin Good job dnb_cbr and thanks for sharing Leechman
the second fish looks like a fresh run too...wow  great job hooking steel in the summer!
Thanks time to dust of the pin lol. nice catch bud
Oh dear.. here comes the flood of steelhead reports, and the fighting that ensues!
Did someone say STEELE?  wait ... SILIVO! where have you been?
Enjoying myself before the salmon take over my life!!! i can smell them there getting close:)
Hey Kemper I'm surprised you haven't posted some summer steel.  Dave was telling me you were hitting droppies for quite a while!
I was, I had them chasing down 3 inch minnow patterns on the fly! Didn't want to post anything because I was enjoying doing it all alone...
